nodes.text: A male individual was the captain of the starship Mandible in the Galactic Empire during the Imperial Era. Sometime by the year 3 ABY, he ferried volatile cargo while under the influence of alcohol, leading to an accident that killed numerous crew members. Everi Chalis, an emissary to the Imperial Ruling Council, punished the crew of the Mandible during the Belnar Insurrections and executed the individuals responsible for the accident, including the captain.

In 3 ABY, Chalis, who had since defected to the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry, cited the punishment of the Mandible's crew when pressuring an Imperial heavy freighter into changing course. Chalis also recounted the story of the Mandible and its accident under the drunk captain to Hazram Namir, a First Sergeant in the company.
The captain was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
